DataElement.preferredName: Association Class Unified Modeling Language Metadata Bidirectional Flag java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: In UML modeling, an association that is also a class.  It not only connects a set of classes, but also defines a set of features that belong to the relationship itself.:A non-proprietary, third generation modelling language. The Unified Modeling Language is an open method used to specify, visualise, construct and document the artifacts of an object-oriented software-intensive system under development. The UML represents:Data about data; information that describes another set of data._Reactive or functioning or allowing movement in two usually opposite directions.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

Concepts.definition: In UML modeling, an association that is also a class.  It not only connects a set of classes, but also defines a set of features that belong to the relationship itself.

A non-proprietary, third generation modelling language. The Unified Modeling Language is an open method used to specify, visualise, construct and document the artifacts of an object-oriented software-intensive system under development. The UML represents a compilation of "best engineering practices" which have proven successful in modelling large, complex systems.
Data about data; information that describes another set of data.

Property.preferredDefinition: Reactive or functioning or allowing movement in two usually opposite directions.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Reactive or functioning or allowing movement in two usually opposite directions.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
